ThingDef.label: Frontier Uniform (Torrid)
ThingDef.description: Some worlds within the great domain were not made for life, such as the Spiceworlds, who great produced the addictions of the domain's courts. The hellish worlds rose to such high temperatures that the presence of water was considered an anomaly. However the desire for the drugs of which the Spiceworlds produced drove humanity into hell itself. Rather than loose clothing like many desert cultures, the Torrid uniform uses a series of chemical bladders filled with a liquid compound which generates a pleasent cold in the hot environments. Some coats in the past have malfunctioned, leading some to freeze to death in the desert.

ThingDef.label: Field Hat (Torrid)
ThingDef.description: A modified form of the arid headgear, this variant possess a few chemical bladders similar to the torrid uniform. However, when it came to the hazards fo the desert, instead of keeping ones head cool, one must protect themselves from the other elements. Possessing a facewrap which in addition to the chemical bladder also possess a robust filter to keep the hazardous dusts from ones lungs, and a pair of goggles which protect the wearers eyes from the dust and from the often blinding lights of the desert.
